sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <UpdateUser xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">String</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">String</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientTimestamp> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientIP> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientOSUser> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">String</company> <!-- nillable--> <targetName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</targetName> <!-- nillable--> <person xsi:type="m:SoapPersonParameters"> <!-- nillable--> <active xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</active> <!-- nillable--> <customAttributes xsi:type="m:SoapCustomAttributeList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <customAttribute xsi:type="m:SoapCustomAttribute"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <value xsi:type="xsd:string">String</value> </customAttribute> </customAttributes> <!-- nillable--> <customFields xsi:type="m:SoapCustomFieldList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <customField xsi:type="m:SoapCustomField"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <value xsi:type="xsd:string">String</value> </customField> </customFields> <externallyOwned xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</externallyOwned> <!-- nillable--> <firstName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</firstName> <hasMobileAccess xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</hasMobileAccess> <!-- nillable--> <language xsi:type="xsd:string">String</language> <!-- nillable--> <lastName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</lastName> <!-- nillable--> <phoneLogin xsi:type="m:SoapPhoneLogin"> <hasPhoneLogin xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</hasPhoneLogin> <!-- nillable--> <phoneLogin xsi:type="xsd:string">String</phoneLogin> <!-- nillable--> <phonePassword xsi:type="xsd:string">String</phonePassword> </phoneLogin> <!-- nillable--> <roles xsi:type="m:SoapRoleList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <role xsi:type="m:SoapRole"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> </role> </roles> <!-- nillable--> <site xsi:type="xsd:string">String</site> <!-- nillable--> <supervisors xsi:type="m:SoapSupervisorList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <supervisor xsi:type="m:SoapSupervisor"> <!-- nillable--> <targetName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</targetName> </supervisor> </supervisors> <!-- nillable--> <targetName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</targetName> <!-- nillable--> <timeZone xsi:type="xsd:string">String</timeZone> <!-- nillable--> <webLogin xsi:type="m:SoapWebLogin"> <!-- nillable--> <ldapDomain xsi:type="xsd:string">String</ldapDomain> <!-- nillable--> <login xsi:type="xsd:string">String</login> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">String</password> <!-- nillable--> <type xsi:type="xsd:string">String</type> </webLogin> </person> </UpdateUser> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
